title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unlocking possibilities with AWS Compute (INV207)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 借助 AWS 计算解锁无限可能 (INV207)
abstract: Join Willem Visser, Vice President of Amazon EC2, for an inside look at AWS's transformative compute innovations across instances, containers, serverless technologies, and more. Willem will explore how AWS’ customer obsession led to implementing radical new ideas that revolutionized cloud computing, and will be joined by Barry Cooks, Vice President of Compute Abstractions at AWS. Discover how AWS's comprehensive compute capabilities enable you to build, run, and scale breakthrough applications in the cloud and at the edge.
abstract_cn: 加入 AWS Amazon EC2 副总裁 Willem Visser，深入了解 AWS 在实例、容器、无服务器技术等方面的变革性计算创新。Willem 将探讨 AWS 的客户至上理念如何引领实施革命性的新想法，彻底改变了云计算，并将与 AWS 计算抽象副总裁 Barry Cooks 一同出席。了解 AWS 全面的计算能力如何帮助您在云端和边缘构建、运行和扩展突破性应用程序。
